summary: got bored.... nothing better to do
descriptionHtml:
------------
Description
------------

Add 2 Hats, as you can see in the pictures above. for both male and female!
It's like a stuffed animal on your head xD

------------
Location
------------

You can craft them under hide armor section or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AdditemMenu[/url] mod. 

-----------
Permissions and Credit
------------

All meshes and textures are free to use assets as stated by the original creators in their description and permission, I slightly modified the texture a little and made a new normal map.

Frog Resource by [b]Roblesstevena[/b] 
Wa Ribbon by [b]Higeyosi[/b] 
Monster Eyes by [b]SartanMor[/b]
Better Butterflies by [b]Chocolambot[/b]
